WorkItem.Description:
When trying to use MVVM Light inside XAML files that are intended for both Silverlight and WPF, it would be nice if MVVM Light had an http reference such as:

http://schemas.galasoft.ch/mvvm

Then the XAML file can utilize this reference and eliminate references to specific assemblies.

This can be accomplished via additions to the AssemblyInfo.cs file like so:

[assembly: XmlnsDefinition("http://schemas.galasoft.ch/mvvm", "GalaSoft.MvvmLight")]
[assembly: XmlnsDefinition("http://schemas.galasoft.ch/mvvm", "GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Command")]
[assembly: XmlnsDefinition("http://schemas.galasoft.ch/mvvm", "GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Helpers")]
[assembly: XmlnsDefinition("http://schemas.galasoft.ch/mvvm", "GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Messaging")]

etc.
WorkItem.Summary: Enhancement Request: Add http reference for MvvmLight
